Articles.Content:
Using the StarSystems Mod and Krag's Planet Factory, anyone is now able to create full, working multiple solar systems complete with planets and moons in KSP. This is just the beginning for this mod and it's possibilities! Deep Space: Kerbal!

Buy the Game:
www.kerbalspaceprogram.com

Check the mods out!

StarSystems v0.1:
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86999-0-24-StarSystems-v0-1

Krag's Planet Factory & CE:
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60318-Krags-PlanetFactory-Updated-Jan-22

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65401-WIP-PlanetFactory-CE

Dooz's Kaiser System:
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77711-23-Dooz-s-Kaiser-System-Planet-Pack-For-PF-CE



Get the Music:

ApproachingNirvana - Aura
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OVLXgz...

Channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/Approachi...

Itunes:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/aur...
How is your KSP 32-bit able to handle this?
I am using ATM and low settings! haha

You should have used Wot...

I know right? Can never have enough gas giants! My only problem is that the new EVE clouds seem to make them all Jool when you get close. Something with PSQ?
I can't add more gas giants.. I have 5 gas giants (Kaiser, Wot, Spes, Freezer, and Titan) plus Sentar and now my game crashes before the "Loading" screen if I add more.

I can't add more gas giants.. I have 5 gas giants (Kaiser, Wot, Spes, Freezer, and Titan) plus Sentar and now my game crashes before the "Loading" screen if I add more.

What are Spes and Titan? I have Kaiser, Wot, Sentar, Urania, and Freezer in the save I'm using now.

I've also edited the Distant Object configs to include my versions of the planet colors haha.
Spes is my own system, Titan is a pack made by the guy who made Hercules.
